PISTOL.strategy: **2-1-2 Setup**: 2 players A main (1 donut, 1 default), 1 player mid connector, 2 players B main. Mid player calls rotations, A players trade frag donut control.
**Aggressive Mid**: 3 players mid (temple control), 1 player A, 1 player B. Mid players push for picks, A/B players play retake positions if mid gets control.
**Stack A**: 3 players A site (donut, default, quad), 2 players mid/B. Play for A retakes, mid players rotate fast on B contact.
**Connector Hold**: 2 players A, 2 players connector/mid, 1 player B. Connector players hold aggressively, deny mid control with utility.
**Anti-Rush A**: 3 players A (close angles), 1 player mid, 1 player B. A players play crossfires, focus on trading frags against rushes.
**Rotational**: 1 player A, 2 players mid, 2 players B. Play for information, fast rotates based on contact. Mobile defense.
**Temple Control**: 2 players A, 3 players mid/temple. Temple players push for picks, deny T mid control with aggressive positioning.
**B Stack**: 1 player A, 1 player mid, 3 players B. Force Ts to A, play for fast B to A rotates with utility support.
**Donut Focus**: 2 players A (both donut area), 2 players mid, 1 player B. Heavy donut control, mid players support A on contact.
**Info Play**: 2 players A, 1 player mid, 2 players B. All players play for information first, retakes second. Conservative angles.

ECO.strategy: **Stack A Close**: 4 players A site (close angles), 1 player B. Upgraded pistols, play for close-range trades. B player saves.
**Aggressive Mid**: 3 players mid with upgraded pistols, 2 players save. Mid players push for picks, savers play retake positions.
**B Stack Save**: 1 player A (save), 4 players B close angles. Upgraded pistols B, focus on overwhelming one site.
**Connector Push**: 2 players A, 3 players mid (aggressive connector). Mid players buy armor+pistol, push for picks early round.
**Anti-Force A**: 3 players A close, 2 players mid/B save. A players upgraded pistols, play crossfires against force buys.
**Full Save**: All players save completely. 2 A, 1 mid, 2 B. Play passive angles, focus on survival and information.
**Donut Control**: 2 players A (1 upgraded pistol donut), 2 players mid, 1 player B save. Donut player goes for picks.
**Temple Push**: 1 player A, 3 players mid (temple push), 1 player B. Mid players upgraded pistols, aggressive temple control.
**Retake Focus**: 2 players A, 1 player mid, 2 players B. All save, play for retakes with utility. Conservative positioning.
**Mixed Buy**: 2 players A (1 upgraded pistol), 2 players mid (1 upgraded pistol), 1 player B save. Selective buys for picks.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **Rifle Mid**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 2 players mid (1 rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Rifles hold long angles, SMG close.
**A Heavy**: 3 players A (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 1 player mid (rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Strong A hold, fast rotates.
**Connector Control**: 2 players A (SMGs), 3 players mid (2 rifles, 1 SMG). Mid rifles hold connector, deny T control.
**Anti-Execute**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 2 players mid (1 rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Rifles long angles, SMGs retake positions.
**Temple Hold**: 2 players A (SMGs), 3 players mid (2 rifles temple), 1 player B (save). Temple rifles deny mid control.
**Balanced**: 2 players A (1 rifle, 1 SMG), 2 players mid (1 rifle, 1 SMG), 1 player B (rifle). Even distribution.
**B Heavy**: 2 players A (SMGs), 1 player mid (rifle), 2 players B (1 rifle, 1 SMG). Strong B hold, A retakes.
**Donut Rifle**: 2 players A (1 rifle donut), 2 players mid (1 rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Rifle holds donut angle.
**Aggressive Mid**: 2 players A (SMGs), 3 players mid (2 rifles push). Mid rifles take aggressive map control early.
**Retake Setup**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 1 player mid (rifle), 2 players B (1 rifle, 1 SMG). Focus on retake utility.

FULL_BUY.strategy: **Standard 2-1-2**: 2 players A (rifles), 1 player mid (AWP), 2 players B (rifles). AWP connector, rifles hold sites.
**A Heavy**: 3 players A (rifles + utility), 1 player mid (rifle), 1 player B (rifle). Strong A execute defense.
**Mid Control**: 2 players A (rifles), 3 players mid (AWP + 2 rifles). Heavy mid presence, fast rotations.
**Connector Deny**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players mid (rifles + utility), 1 player B (rifle). Smoke connector, deny control.
**Anti-Split**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players mid (rifles), 1 player B (rifle + utility). Focus on split defense.
**AWP Donut**: 2 players A (1 AWP donut, 1 rifle), 2 players mid (rifles), 1 player B (rifle). AWP holds donut angle.
**Temple Control**: 2 players A (rifles), 3 players mid (rifles + AWP temple). Temple AWP for picks, rifles support.
**B Stack**: 1 player A (rifle), 2 players mid (rifles), 2 players B (rifles). Force A plays, rotate with utility.
**Retake Heavy**: 2 players A (rifles), 1 player mid (rifle), 2 players B (rifles + utility). Focus on retake coordination.
**Aggressive Setup**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players mid (rifles push), 1 player B (rifle). Mid rifles take map control.

PISTOL.strategy: **A Site Rush**: All 5 players buy armor. Rush A main together with coordinated pop-flashes. First two players trade frag, last three clean up site.
**Mid Control**: 3 players go mid (1 with smoke), 2 players go A main. Mid players smoke connector, take middle control. A players create noise but don't commit.
**B Split**: 2 players go B main, 3 players go through mid to B. Mid players smoke connector, wait for B main contact, then execute split timing.
**A Default**: 2 A main, 2 mid, 1 B. Play for picks and information. Mid players smoke connector if they get aggressive.
**Donut Rush**: 4 players A main, 1 player B (noise only). A players coordinate pop-flashes and rush donut/site together.
**Mid to B**: All 5 players go mid. Smoke connector, flash over smoke, rush through to B site. Fast execution.
**A Fake to B**: 3 players make noise A main with utility, 2 players go B main quietly. Once A gets response, rotate through mid.
**Temple Control**: 2 players A main, 3 players mid focusing on temple area. Temple players smoke connector, take control.
**Stack B**: 4 players B main with utility, 1 player A main for info. B players use pop-flashes and coordinate peek.
**Anti-Eco**: Spread utility across team. Play default positions, use utility to isolate duels. Don't overpeek.

ECO.strategy: **Five-Seven A Rush**: Everyone buys Five-Seven + armor. Rush A main together with pop-flashes. Focus on trading kills and getting weapons.
**Stack B**: All 5 players stack B site. Buy upgraded pistols + armor. Play close angles, use pop-flashes.
**Mid Lurk**: 1 player lurks mid with upgraded pistol, 4 players force buy A main. Mid player waits for rotation.
**Deagle + Support**: 2 players buy Deagle + armor, 3 players support with flashes/smokes. Deagle players take long angles.
**Temple Rush**: 4 players buy armor + upgraded pistols, rush temple from mid. 1 player saves in spawn.
**Anti-Force**: 3 players buy armor + Five-Seven, 2 players save completely. Force players go A main, play for picks.
**B Main Contact**: 2 players buy armor + upgraded pistols B main, 3 players save mid. B players go for aggressive contact.
**Connector Fight**: 3 players buy armor + upgraded pistols, fight connector from mid. 2 players save A main.
**Split Save**: 2 players force buy A main, 2 players force buy B main, 1 player saves mid.
**Full Save**: All players save money completely. Play for exit frags only. Get information and positioning.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **A Main Control**: 3 players buy rifles, 2 players buy SMGs. Rifles take A main control with smokes/flashes.
**Mid Presence**: 2 rifles mid, 2 SMGs A main, 1 rifle B. Mid players smoke connector, take temple control.
**B Split Execute**: 2 rifles B main, 2 SMGs mid to B, 1 rifle A (lurk). Mid players smoke connector, execute split.
**Economy Aggression**: 3 rifles, 2 SMGs. Rifles take key angles, SMGs play support. Focus on getting picks.
**Temple Control**: 4 players mid (2 rifles, 2 SMGs), 1 rifle A main. Mid players smoke connector, take temple.
**Anti-Full Buy**: 2 rifles long angles, 3 SMGs close angles. Use utility to isolate duels.
**Donut Focus**: 3 rifles A main, 2 SMGs B main. A players smoke donut, take site control.
**Connector Deny**: 2 rifles mid, 2 SMGs A main, 1 rifle B. Mid rifles smoke connector, deny middle control.
**Pick Heavy**: Spread team across map with rifles on long angles. Play for picks.
**Site Focus**: 4 players A (2 rifles, 2 SMGs), 1 rifle B. A players smoke multiple angles, take site control.

FULL_BUY.strategy: **A Site Execute**: Smoke donut + A main, flash over smokes. 4 players execute A site. 1 player lurks mid.
**Mid Control**: 3 players mid with smokes/flashes, 2 players A main. Mid players smoke connector, take temple control.
**B Split**: 2 players B main, 3 players mid to B. Smoke connector + B site, flash over smokes.
**Default Setup**: 2 A main, 2 mid, 1 B. Smoke key angles, play for picks. Execute based on information.
**A Fake to B**: 3 players make noise A main with utility, 2 players position mid. Execute B through mid.
**Temple Take**: 4 players mid, 1 player A main. Mid players smoke connector, take temple control with flashes.
**Anti-Stack B**: Smoke A main + donut, 4 players execute A site. Heavy utility usage on A site.
**Connector Control**: 3 players mid, 2 players A main. Mid players smoke connector, fight for middle control.
**Late Round B**: Play default until 45 seconds, then all 5 execute B through mid.
**AWP Setup**: AWPer mid, 2 riflers A main, 2 riflers B main. AWPer calls rotations, riflers execute based on info.
